title: Melting the Ice
description: Mia is a single mother of a very good goalie. She enrolled Jane in hockey camp but her daughter had one she will go only if her mom would accompany her. Mia wanted to say no because Zach was there. Zach, her childhood crush, was Jane’s coach. She dreamed of having a steamy romance with the hot hockey coach but she knew it was against the rules. Romance is not allowed in camp, especially between coaches and parents of the participants.Mia promised Jane that she will support her and help her achieve her dream of competing in the state and national tournaments. She loves her daughter so much, even if the man who was the father left her the moment he told her she was pregnant. She dedicated her life to loving Jane. But will she also get her heart’s desire in this journey?Can she and Zach finally melt the wall of ice that stood between them after all these years?This book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Adara Fernandez
